attributes.action: Tell Manchester City council they are a joke and why
attributes.additional_details:
Spending over 100,000 pound on moving the homeless in 8weeks.

Trying to implement a ban on homeless sleeping on the streets.

Independent living fund being able to be stopped for disabled people.

Under 21s having housing benefit stopped.
attributes.background: We are sick of Manchester City council not listening we are sick of Manchester councillors and MPs not doing enough. So we want to tell Manchester City council that they are a joke and exactly why

rejection.details: We have contacted you to explain that this is not the Government's responsibility. You would need to submit a petition about the Government policy that covers these matters.
